Updated November     pm





Thenfreshman Jaden Ivey celebrates on the floor after Purdue regained momentum in the second half erasing an 18point halftime deficit against Ohio State in  PERIOD

Sophomore guard Jaden Ivey earned a spot on the CBS preseason AllAmerican second team according to a Purdue press release PERIOD

The guard joins two Big Ten playersIndiana forward Trayce JacksonDavis and Michigan center Hunter Dickinson  on the second team while Illinoiss Kofi Cockburn took a spot on the first team PERIOD

Headed by Gonzaga forward Drew Timme who won preseason Player of the Year the first team features players from across the college basketball landscape in UCLA guard Johnny Juzang Duke forward Paulo Banchero and Oral Roberts guard Max Abrams PERIOD

Ivey found his way into the Big Ten AllFreshman team after he averaged . points . rebounds and . assists in  games and  starts with the Boilermakers PERIOD The guard poured on  points against North Texas  the most by any Big Ten freshman in an NCAA tournament debut PERIOD

Ivey built up his reputation as one of the best upandcoming players in the Big Ten with two midseason conference Freshman of the Week awards one after clutch shots in late January and one after a 20point performance against Northwestern in early February PERIOD

Ivey also represented the Boilermakers on the international stage as a member of Team USA in the FIBA U19 World Cup in Latvia PERIOD Ivey won the gold medal for the United States alongside thencommitted forward Caleb Furst averaging . points three rebounds and . assists in . minutes per contest against some of the worlds most talented young players PERIOD

Fans can watch Ivey and the rest of Purdue Basketball in their first exhibition game against the University of Indianapolis on Nov PERIOD  PERIOD The game can be streamed on BTN PERIOD
